entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
